comment.text: @stransky, just out of curiosity, is there a specific reason new koji build (i.e. -3) is based on 111.0 and not 111.0.1? To me it looks like the changelog of 111.0.1 contains fixes that aren't just for Windows/Mac, but could be totally off there.
I just missed that. New builds (111.0.1) are on the way.

long_desc.thetext: Thanks; is there a reason this hasn't been triggered on Koji yet?
I am not Firefox package maintainer, so i do not know.
Really sad, considering the security impact of firefox major updates (so in this case).ðŸ˜…
